channel.title: Need Help With client.java
channel.description: i put sometihng in to try to stop SYIpkpkers but when i compile this comes up... what do i do?? and appendToBanned dosent work ethier

item.title: Need Help With client.java
item.dc:creator: @Patrick1 Patrick_
item.description:
@Patrick1 wrote:

Not mine but I can give it to you though. Credits to Daniel;

Class…

[code]import java.util.Vector;
import java.util.List;
public final class ConnectedList {

private static ConnectedList instance;
private List<String> list = new Vector<String>(500);

public static ConnectedList getInstance()	{
	if(instance == null)
		instance = new ConnectedList();
	return instance;
}

public void add(final String s)	{
	list.add(s);
}

public void remove(final String s)	{
	if(contains(s))
		list.remove(s);
}

public boolean contains(final String s)	{
	return list.contains(s);
}

}[/code]

Server

private final ConnectedList list = ConnectedList.getInstance();

Find

 playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost);

Replace with

if(!list.contains(connectingHost)) { playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); list.add(connectingHost); } else { System.err.println(connectingHost+" already connected!"); s.close(); }

Client find

 public void destruct()

above destruct()

list.remove(connectedFrom);

Also add in Client

private final ConnectedList list = ConnectedList.getInstance();

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With client.java
item.dc:creator: @Goran Goran
item.description:
@Goran wrote:

Patrick_:

Not going to lie, but just saying to ban it won’t do anything. You need to make it so the server can allow a maximum of 3 logins per IP. Therefor, SYI can’t load more then 3+. Then again, you can make it single-threaded.

ok how do i do this?

Read full topic
